creator: Alexander Terp
title: RAD-371: Rad block inline json path syntax
description:
Often, you don't really care to use the variable in json path capture for anything other than the Rad block which ensues. Perhaps we can inline?

```
rad url:
    # Pick fields to display from the response
    fields
        json[].commit.author.date  as Time,
        json[].commit.author.name  as Author,
        json[].sha                 as SHA
```
